-------------------- Text: Qianmen () is the colloquial name for Zhengyangmen (;Manchu:ᡨᠣᠪ
ᡧᡠᠨ
ᡳ
ᡩᡠᡴᠠ ;Möllendorff:tob šun i duka; meaning "gate of the zenith Sun"), a gate in Beijing's historic city wall. Triplets:
1:
--------------------
<Text: Zhengyangmen:  The gate is situated to the south of Tiananmen Square and once guarded the southern entry into the Inner City.>

Text: Zhengyangmen:  The city's central north-south axis passes through Zhengyangmen's main gate.

4:

<Text: Zhengyangmen:  It was formerly named Lizhengmen (), meaning "beautiful portal".>
